quote: Every traveler has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering. – Charles Dickens
fact: Facetious and abstemious contain all the vowels in the correct order, as does arsenious, meaning "containing arsenic."
joke: What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear!
